text: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
translation.id.indonesian: atau supaya jangan ada yang berkata: 'Kalau sekiranya Allah memberi petunjuk kepadaku tentulah aku termasuk orang-orang yang bertakwa'.
